layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x53
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x53
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x21
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x21
        LayoutBlockFlow {input} at (4,3) size 13x13 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (20,1) size 4x19
          text run at (20,1) width 4: " "
        LayoutInline {span} at (0,0) size 388x19 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutText {#text} at (24,1) size 388x19
            text run at (24,1) width 388: "Everything in this paragraph should have a green background"
